import React from 'react'; import Header from '../components/header'; import check from '../images/check.svg' import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "unistore/react"; import { actions } from "../store/store"; class CheckoutSukses extends React.Component { render () { return (

Selesaikan pembayaran anda dalam waktu 24 jam

rekening BRI

atas nama PT. BABYBUN Tbk
) } } export default connect('keranjang', actions)(withRouter(CheckoutSukses));
